entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Westlock
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
